name: guardian-plex
description: Guardian is a self-hosted web dashboard for monitoring Docker containers and system metrics. It provides a clean UI for viewing container state, logs, and resource usage in real-time.
features: Container Monitoring: Track Docker container status, health, and resource consumption in real-time.
Log Viewing: Access container logs directly from the web interface for troubleshooting.
Resource Metrics: Monitor CPU, memory, and network usage for each running container.
Container Management: Start, stop, restart, and remove containers from the dashboard.
System Overview: View host system metrics alongside container statistics.
Clean Interface: Simple, intuitive dashboard focused on essential container information.
Real-Time Updates: Automatic refresh of container status and metrics without page reload.
Lightweight Deployment: Minimal overhead suitable for running alongside monitored containers.
